resources.string: "Please check WiFi connection is stable 1. Smart device password is correctly inputted 2. Slow network speeds 3. Does not support WEP or EAP encryption 4. Router is not connected to external network 5. Public WAN network is unable to connect 6. 5G WiFi network is unable to connect "

When phone is connected to air purifier for the first time or cant connect, please press "mode" and "light" button for 5 secs then reset WiFi

"Description:
Detected when the filter needs to be replaced, filter replacement lights flash red for 30 seconds when device is open. Replace filter, reboot and long press the filter reset button on the back of the device at the same time, when you hear "DI DI" alarm the filter replacement will be completed.
Make sure to replace with a new filter and reset data. Failure will result in air quality not being detected
If you do not replace the filter and reset it will result in a failure to detect the filter
Recommended to power on air purifier
Manual detection being used, automatic detection is switched off
Determine the current location using phone as a device location?
When air quality is poor you will be reminded to turn on purifier
In the off state, if room quality is poor the air purifier will automatically clear the room air. When air is returned to normal conditions the purifier will automatically shutdown
When outdoor air is safe you will be reminded to open window ventilation
When abnormal operation is detected you will receive a notification alert
Uses a small amount of electricity each day
Automatically start when the indoor air is poor quality, then automatically shutdown
Please update to the latest Firmware version
Your device does not support this feature, please update your Firmware
Prevent children from tampering with the device
Automatically shutdown when air quality is at healthy levels
"Air purifier needs to use the phones current location, make sure it's near the air purifier"
Failed to get location, timed out!
You can monitor the air quantity of your home when your phone is powered off. Do you want to open it?
Open, you can turn off this feature via settings

"Description:
Detected when the filter needs to be replaced, filter replacement lights flash red for 30 seconds when device is open. Replace filter, reboot and long press the filter reset button on the back of the device at the same time, when you hear "DI DI" alarm the filter replacement will be completed.
Make sure to replace with a new filter and reset data. Failure will result in air quality not being detected
If you do not replace the filter and reset data it will result in detection failure for air quality

Manual detection, automatic detection is turned off

Automatically start when the indoor air is poor quality, then automatically shutdown

Prevent misuse by children operating the device
Automatic shutdown mode, automatically checks hourly air quality

"Description:
Detected when the filter needs to be replaced, filter replacement lights flash red for 30 seconds when device is open. Replace filter, reboot and long press the filter reset button on the back of the device at the same time, when you hear "DI DI" alarm the filter replacement will be completed.

When air quality is poor you will be reminded to turn on purifier
When room air is poor quality, automatically power on to air and automatically power off when completed
When outdoor air is ok, you will be reminded to open windows for ventilation
When exceptions occur you will be notified automatically

White represents purity and elegance. White symbolizes fair, pure, dignified, honest, young and vigorous. Transcend the mundane and relax.
Pink is cute, romantic and very popular for woman and girls. Create a fairy tail lighting mood.
Yellow gives a feeling of calm, makes your eyes clear and bright. Yellow also reminds us of the sun, symbolizing the light of wisdom to illuminate the darkness.
Purple represents strong emotion, elegance and noble personality. It has a wealth of sensitivity, aesthetic taste and very self aware.
Voltage range is from 100v to 240v, please dont use it on the lamp holders with dimming function
Name can not be more than four characters
